Name: HomeListingAI
Description: Turn Every Listing Into a 24/7 Lead Machine.
HomeListingAI is a web app for real estate agents that turns listings into lead-capture pages with an AI Listing Page and a 1-page Market Report.

Core Value Proposition: 
Share a link or QR code, capture buyer/seller leads automatically. AI handles inquiries 24/7.

Pricing:
- Free tier available
- Starter $34/mo
- Pro $79/mo

Key URLs:
- Main Website: https://homelistingai.com
- Privacy Policy: https://homelistingai.com/privacy-policy
- Terms of Service: https://homelistingai.com/terms-of-service
- Contact / Support: https://homelistingai.com
